fn.p: Authors’ contributions: Aleksandra Opalska – contributed to the study conception and design; performed data collection, analysis, and drafted the manuscript; contributed to interpretation of data; critically revised the manuscript for important intellectual content. Marcel Kwa – contributed to the study conception and design; contributed to interpretation of data; critically revised the manuscript for important intellectual content.

Hubert Leufkens - contributed to the study conception and design; critically revised the manuscript for important intellectual content. Helga Gardarsdottir - contributed to the study conception and design; helped with drafting the manuscript; contributed to interpretation of data; critically revised the manuscript for important intellectual content. All authors read and approved the final manuscript submitted for publication.
